{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Ice ball | class = HeadFX1 | game = Heretic | spawnid = 164 | spawnname = T_IRONLICHBLUESHOT }}[[Classes]]: HeadFX1
The large ball of ice hurled by one of the [[Classes:Ironlich|iron lich]]'s [[A_LichAttack|attacks]]. Its native action [[A_LichIceImpact]] spawns eight [[Classes:HeadFX2|ice shards]] all around the impact point at 45Â° angle intervals. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR HeadFX1 { {{Property|Radius}} 12 {{Property|Height}} 6 {{Property|Speed}} 13 {{Property|FastSpeed}} 20 {{Property|Damage}} 1 {{Property|Projectile}} -{{Flag|ACTIVATEIMPACT}} -{{Flag|ACTIVATEPCROSS}} +{{Flag|THRUGHOST}} {{Property|RenderStyle}} Add action native [[A_LichIceImpact]](); States { Spawn: FX05 ABC 6 Bright Loop Death: FX05 D 5 Bright [[A_LichIceImpact]] FX05 EFG 5 Bright Stop } }
